name: West of Dead
summary: Step into the boots of the dead man William Mason (voiced by Ron Perlman) and descend into the grim and gritty world of Purgatory in this fast-paced twin-stick shooter that’ll put your skills to test. Dodge behind cover as you try to outgun your enemies in the unknown procedurally generated hunting grounds. The Wild West has never been this dark."
info:
• 发行: Raw Fury
  • 别名: 死亡西部
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Switch
  • 游戏类型: Twin-stick shooter
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2020年6月18日
  • 官方网站: https://westofdead.com/
  • 开发: Upstream Arcade
